nuage_unzipped_files_dir.title: Unzipped file directory
nuage_unzipped_files_dir.description: Paths to find unzipped image files (e.g. qcow2)

user_ssh_pub_key.title: SSH public key
user_ssh_pub_key.description: Path to a public key file to be injected in to VSD, VNS Util, VCIN and VSTAT vms during deployment and corresponding private file to be used to connect to the components during deployment

user_ssh_priv_key.title: SSH private key
user_ssh_priv_key.description: Path to a private key file to be injected in to VSD, VNS Util, VCIN and VSTAT vms during deployment and corresponding private file to be used to connect to the components during deployment

target_server_username.title: Target server username
target_server_username.description: Remote user name for ansible to execute as on the target server (hypervisor).

ansible_sudo_username.title: Sudo username
ansible_sudo_username.description: The sudo user for local actions.

vsd_fqdn_global.title: VSD global FQDN
vsd_fqdn_global.description: Use xmpp FQDN for clustered VSDs and the VSD FQDN for stand-alone.

images_path.title: Images directory
images_path.description: Location to create VM images on KVM target servers.

vsd_fallocate_size_gb.title: VSD disk space allocation
vsd_fallocate_size_gb.description: Amount of VSD disk space to fallocate, in GB

libnetwork_scope.title: Network scope
libnetwork_scope.description: local: connectivity between containers is limited to within the local host. global: connectivity between containers may span across hosts in the cluster.

libnetwork_cluster_store_scheme.title: Cluster store URL scheme
libnetwork_cluster_store_scheme.description: Scheme of URL pointing to the key-value store used for the cluster.

libnetwork_cluster_store_host.title: Cluster store URL host
libnetwork_cluster_store_host.description: Host of URL pointing to the key-value store used for the cluster.

libnetwork_cluster_store_port.title: Cluster store URL port
libnetwork_cluster_store_port.description: Port of URL pointing to the key-value store used for the cluster.
